article.headline: Gardner-Webb 69, Mercer 68
article.story: BOILING SPRINGS, N.C. (AP) -- Chris Gash scored 18 points and put in the last shot of the game to give Gardner-Webb a 69-68 win over Mercer on Thursday. Thomas Sanders had 13 points, Grayson Flittner added 11 and Matt French pulled down a game-high 13 rebounds for Gardner-Webb (8-17, 6-8 Atlantic Sun). Gash, who also had nine rebounds for the Runnin' Bulldogs, tallied his 1,000th career point during the first half as his team built a 39-11 lead. Mercer (10-12, 6-7 Atlantic Sun) trailed by 28 points with a little more than two minutes left in the first half, but the Bears outscored the Bulldogs 46-25 in the second half and nearly pulled off a win. Mercer led 68-62 with 2:46 left before the Bulldogs outscored the Bears 7-0 in the final moments. Gash's layup with four seconds remaining sealed it for Gardner-Webb. Shaddean Aaron led all scorers with 23 points for Mercer, and James Florence added 10.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
